nodes.text: Tac-Comm was an organization based in Anchorhead on Tatooine. Prior to the rescue of Han Solo, Leia Organa requested information from Tac-Com in the form of eyewitness descriptions of the interior of Jabba's Palace. Tac-Com collected this information from interviews with musicians and entertainers. The result included transcripts named "Rystall" and "Rappertunie".
